content:
@article{bhaya2007population,
    author = {Bhaya, D. and Grossman, A.R. and Steunou, A.-S. and Khuri, N. and Cohan, F.M. and Hamamura, N. and Melendrez, M.C. and Bateson, M.M. and Ward, D.M. and Heidelberg, J.F.},
    title = {Population level functional diversity in a microbial community revealed by comparative genomic and metagenomic analyses},
    journal = {ISME Journal},
    volume = {1},
    pages = {703--713},
    year = {2007},
    doi = {10.1038/ismej.2007.53},
    url = {https://doi.org/10.1038/ismej.2007.53},
    abstract = {This study reveals the functional diversity within a microbial community through comparative genomic and metagenomic analyses.}
}
